item.title: 人工智能芯片制造商Cerebras Systems完成10亿美元后期融资
item.description: 人工智能芯片制造商Cerebras Systems周三宣布，在最新一轮后期融资中筹集了10亿美元资金，公司估值达到230亿美元。【原文：AI chip maker Cerebras Systems said on Wednesday it raised $1 billion in a late-stage funding round that valued it at $23 billion.】

item.title: 特朗普将《非洲增长与机会法案》延期一年，分析师称此举虽短暂却脆弱，为贸易带来喘息之机
item.description: 分析人士指出，美国将非洲优惠贸易计划延长一年，仅能为该大陆带来短暂喘息之机。鉴于两国外交关系紧张，南非能否继续享受该计划仍悬而未决。【原文：Washington's one-year extension of its preferential trade programme for Africa will deliver only a short-lived reprieve for the continent, analysts said, with South Africa's inclusion remaining tenuous amid strained diplomatic relations.】

item.title: 美国服务业1月原地踏步，新订单增速放缓
item.description: 美国服务业1月份保持稳定，但企业为投入品支付了更高成本，这表明在近几个月放缓趋势之后，服务业通胀可能加速上升。【原文：The U.S. services sector held steady in January, but businesses paid more for inputs, suggesting that services inflation could pick up after being on a slowing trend in recent months.】

item.title: 独家：亚马逊计划利用人工智能加速影视制作
item.description: 亚马逊计划利用人工智能加速影视制作流程，而好莱坞则担忧人工智能将导致岗位流失并永久性重塑整个行业。【原文：Amazon plans to use artificial intelligence to speed up the process for making movies and TV shows even as Hollywood fears that AI will cut jobs and permanently reshape the industry.】

item.title: 加拿大服务业PMI显示1月份行业衰退加速
item.description: 标准普尔全球周三公布的加拿大服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）数据显示，受贸易不确定性影响，1月份加拿大服务业经济下滑态势加剧，商业活动和新业务均出现萎缩。【原文：The downturn in Canada's services economy deepened in January as trade uncertainty contributed to declines in activity and new business, S&P Global's Canada services PMI data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥国家石油公司报告称2025年债务达845亿美元
item.description: 墨西哥国有石油公司佩梅克斯2025年财务负债总额为845亿美元，该公司首席执行官维克多·罗德里格斯·帕迪利亚周三在墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆的每日晨间记者会上宣布。【原文：The 2025 financial debt of Mexico's state-owned oil firm Pemex, closed at $84.5 billion, the company's CEO Victor Rodriguez Padilla said on Wednesday during the daily morning press conference of Mexico's president Claudia Sheinbaum.】

item.title: 诺和诺德面临减肥药价格战风险，折扣压力加剧
item.description: 分析师和投资者表示，随着"史无前例"的价格压力迫使丹麦减肥药制造商诺和诺德削减其重磅药物Wegovy在美国市场的售价，该公司新任首席执行官面临在破坏性价格战中落败的风险。【原文：Danish obesity drug maker Novo Nordisk's new CEO risks being on the losing side of a damaging price war as "unprecedented" price pressure forces it to slash the cost of its blockbuster Wegovy drug in the United States, analysts and investors said.】

item.title: 万斯称美国将建立关键矿产价格下限制度
item.description: 美国副总统范斯周三在旨在促进关键矿产获取的50余国会议上表示，美国将建立为这些商品设定价格下限的机制。【原文：U.S. Vice President JD Vance told a meeting of than 50 countries on Wednesday aimed at boosting access to critical minerals that the U.S. will establish a system creating price floors for the commodities.】

item.title: 美国议员、Waymo和特斯拉敦促国会采取行动，加快自动驾驶汽车的部署。
item.description: 立法者、Waymo和特斯拉将敦促国会采取行动，推动长期搁置的立法进程，以加速自动驾驶汽车的部署，并警告来自中国的竞争威胁。【原文：Lawmakers, Waymo and Tesla will urge Congress to take action on long-stalled legislation to speed deployment of self-driving vehicles, warning of competitive threats from China.】

item.title: ElevenLabs以110亿美元估值完成5亿美元融资
item.description: 语音克隆人工智能初创公司ElevenLabs周三宣布，在最新融资轮中获得5亿美元资金后，公司估值已达110亿美元。【原文：Voice-cloning AI startup ElevenLabs has secured an $11 billion valuation after raising $500 million in its latest funding round, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉英国1月销量暴跌，中国竞争对手加速前进，新汽车数据显示
item.description: 新汽车周三发布的数据显示，特斯拉上月在英国的纯电动汽车销量不足中国竞争对手比亚迪的一半，这表明这家美国汽车制造商面临的竞争压力日益加剧。【原文：Tesla sold less than half the number of battery-electric vehicles recorded by Chinese rival BYD in the UK last month, data from New Automotive showed on Wednesday, pointing to mounting competitive pressures on the U.S. automaker.】

item.title: 伊塔乌银行、桑坦德银行和花旗银行达成协议，结束巴西税务纠纷
item.description: 巴西国家财政总检察长办公室（PGFN）近日与伊塔乌银行、桑坦德巴西银行和花旗银行达成和解协议，在过去几周内促成约24亿雷亚尔（4.5813亿美元）的税款缴纳。【原文：Brazil's National Treasury Attorney General's Office (PGFN) has reached settlement deals with lenders Itau , Santander Brasil and Citi that resulted in about 2.4 billion reais ($458.13 million) in tax payments in recent weeks.】

item.title: 《纽约时报》报道称《华盛顿邮报》将裁员数百名记者
item.description: 《纽约时报》周三援引员工视频会议消息报道称，《华盛顿邮报》计划裁减数百名记者。【原文：The Washington Post plans to lay off hundreds of journalists, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing a video call with employees.】

item.title: 纳斯达克提议"快速上市"规则以加速大型新股上市进程
item.description: 纳斯达克交易所提出新规，旨在加快将新上市的大型公司纳入其指数的进程，以解决因延迟导致重大IPO和交易所转板项目长期未能进入基准指数的问题。【原文：Nasdaq has proposed a new rule to speed up the addition of newly listed large companies to its index, seeking to address delays that have left major IPOs and exchange transfers outside the benchmark for months.】

item.title: 美国财政部宣布1250亿美元再融资计划，拍卖规模维持不变
item.description: 美国财政部周三宣布，将于2026年2月至4月期间进行总额1250亿美元的季度再融资，旨在从私人投资者处筹集348亿美元新资金。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department announced on Wednesday total quarterly refunding of $125 billion from February to April 2026, aimed at raising new cash of $34.8 billion from private investors.】

item.title: 福帝维公司因工业自动化业务强劲，对全年利润持乐观预期
item.description: 工业产品制造商富世国际周三预测，得益于其工业自动化部门需求强劲，2026财年利润将超出华尔街预期。【原文：Industrial products maker Fortive on Wednesday forecast fiscal 2026 profit above Wall Street estimates, helped by resilient demand at its industrial automation unit.】

item.title: 美国1月私营部门就业人数小幅增长，ADP报告称
item.description: 美国私营部门就业人数1月份增幅低于预期，ADP周三发布的全国就业报告显示。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased less than expected in January, the ADP's national employment report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价暴跌，肥胖症药物巨头市值蒸发500亿美元
item.description: 诺和诺德股价周三暴跌16%，这家Wegovy制药商的市值蒸发约500亿美元，此前该公司周二警告称其2026年销售额和利润将下滑。【原文：Novo Nordisk shares tumbled 16% on Wednesday, wiping off around $50 billion from the Wegovy maker's market capitalization after it warned on Tuesday its sales and profits would fall in 2026.】

item.title: CDW第四季度业绩超预期，得益于IT解决方案需求的强劲表现
item.description: CDW周三公布的第四季度业绩超出销售额和利润预期，因客户持续投资人工智能和云计算应用。【原文：CDW beat fourth-quarter sales and profit estimates on Wednesday, as clients continue to invest in artificial intelligence and cloud adoption.】

item.title: Live Nation将以1.06亿美元收购意大利ForumNet公司
item.description: Live Nation Entertainment周二晚间宣布，已同意从控股公司Bastogi手中收购意大利场馆运营商ForumNet，此举将增强其在意大利现场娱乐市场的业务布局。【原文：Live Nation Entertainment said late on Tuesday it had agreed to buy Italy-based venue operator ForumNet from holding firm Bastogi , strengthening its presence in Italy's live entertainment market.】

item.title: BetMGM向母公司分红2.7亿美元后，2026年利润预期提升
item.description: BetMGM周三预测年度利润将有所增长，并表示已向母公司美高梅度假村集团和恩泰恩集团支付2.7亿美元分红。此前该公司2025财年业绩超出预期，其在线体育博彩和互动博彩业务板块实现增长。【原文：BetMGM on Wednesday forecast higher annual profit and said it had paid out $270 million to parent companies MGM Resorts and Entain , after 2025 results beat expectations on growth in its online sports betting and iGaming divisions.】

item.title: 福克斯季度营收超预期，得益于体育节目与Tubi平台的强劲表现
item.description: 福克斯公司周三公布的季度营收超出华尔街预期，其新闻和体育频道的广告需求强劲，以及广告支持的流媒体服务Tubi的增长为其提供了支撑。【原文：Fox Corp topped Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Wednesday, buoyed by strong advertising demand at its news and sports networks and growth at its ad-supported streaming service Tubi.】

item.title: 波士顿科学股价下跌，因其对2026年营收预测持谨慎态度
item.description: 波士顿科学公司周三预测2026年营收将温和增长，利润略低于华尔街预期，这一消息掩盖了其强劲的第四季度业绩，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌逾11%。【原文：Boston Scientific Corp forecast modest 2026 revenue growth and profit just below Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, overshadowing a strong fourth-quarter performance and sending its shares down more than 11% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 联合太平洋铁路公司与瓦布泰克公司签署12亿美元机车现代化改造协议
item.description: 铁路运营商联合太平洋公司与机车零部件制造商瓦布泰克周三宣布，双方签署了一项价值12亿美元的协议，将对该铁路公司的AC4400型机车进行现代化改造。【原文：Railroad operator Union Pacific and locomotive parts maker Wabtec signed an agreement worth $1.2 billion to modernize the railroad’s AC4400 locomotives, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 华尔街经纪商Clear Street计划在美国IPO中寻求高达118亿美元估值
item.description: 清街证券周三表示，该公司计划在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中寻求高达118亿美元的估值。随着IPO市场加速升温，这家证券和衍生品经纪商正积极推进上市进程。【原文：Clear Street is targeting a valuation of as much as $11.8 billion in its initial public offering in the U.S., the securities and derivatives broker said on Wednesday, as the IPO market kicks into high gear.】

item.title: 随着全球不确定性加剧，分析师纷纷上调黄金价格预测
item.description: 路透社调查显示，黄金有望在2026年再创历史新高。随着分析师上调预测，地缘政治不确定性与央行强劲购金仍是主要驱动因素。【原文：Gold is set for another record performance in 2026, a Reuters poll showed, as analysts ramp up their forecasts, with geopolitical uncertainty and robust central bank buying still the main drivers.】

item.title: 美元反弹势头或因降息预期及美联储独立性疑虑受阻：路透调查
item.description: 路透社对货币策略师的调查显示，美元近期反弹将短暂，在年内晚些时候恢复更广泛的下跌趋势前将保持稳定。因市场担忧美联储独立性，同时仍抱有降息预期。【原文：The U.S. dollar's recent recovery will be short-lived, holding steady before resuming a broader decline later in the year, a Reuters survey of currency strategists showed, as markets cling to interest rate cut expectations amid concerns about the Federal Reserve’s independence.】

item.title: 艾伯维预计2026年利润将超预期，得益于新型免疫学药物强劲销售
item.description: 艾伯维周三公布的第四季度业绩超出预期，公司预测2026年利润将高于华尔街预期。这一增长得益于新型免疫学药物斯基瑞兹和瑞诺克的强劲需求，以及老牌药品修美乐的销售额下滑幅度小于预期。【原文：AbbVie forecast 2026 profit above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday after posting a fourth-quarter results beat, fueled by strong demand for newer immunology drugs Skyrizi and Rinvoq and a smaller-than-expected decline in sales of its older medicine Humira.】

item.title: 通用电气医疗集团预测2026年利润将超预期，得益于医疗设备强劲需求
item.description: 通用电气医疗周三预测全年利润将超出华尔街预期，押注其诊断和成像设备需求强劲。【原文：GE HealthCare on Wednesday forecast annual profit above Wall Street estimates, betting on robust demand for its diagnostic and imaging devices.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所（CME）因交易活动增加而利润上升
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团周三公布的数据显示，第四季度利润实现增长，这得益于股票和金属产品需求强劲推动了交易量上升。【原文：Derivatives exchange CME Group posted a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, as strong demand for equity and metal products bolstered trading volumes.】
